thread.title: Corbynmania almost makes election loss worth it, claims union boss
thread.title_full: Corbynmania almost makes election loss worth it, claims union boss

title: Corbynmania almost makes election loss worth it, claims union boss
text: Corbynmania almost makes election loss worth it, claims union boss Monday, 5 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) Terry Pullinger angers Labour MPs by suggesting party’s election defeat was a good thing as it paved way for Jeremy Corbyn’s ascent A senior trade unionist has appalled some Labour MPs by suggesting Labour’s election defeat was a good thing because it allowed Jeremy Corbyn to ascend to the party leadership. Addressing ...
